title: Timetable TimeSpread
description:
Organize your schedule with 'TimeSpread'
Check and note your week class schedule easily and quickly.
* Share your schedule with friends. Check out multiple schedules on one screen.
* Set up your own start and end of the day, as well as of the week.
* Customize your background theme to your taste.
* Experience the widget feature
* Manage your schedule to the minute
* Store your time schedule in cloud, and check out whenever you want
* Try “TimeSpread” now without log-in
* Sync with your Google Calendar
* Share your moments in community anonymously
TimeSpread's team is waiting for your feedback.

interactive_elements: Users Interact, Shares Info, Digital Purchases
developer_address: 114, Yeoksam-ro, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea
